title: Microeconomics II
ziele: The IK Micro II discusses into more depth the themes addressed in the course Micro II. In particular, we will do exercises on the themes of the course and there is the possibility to pose questions on issues unclear in the course Micro II.
lehrinhalte: Consumer theory, theory of the firms, partial equilibrium, market structure, general equilibrium, social welfare and social choice
beurteilung: Homework sets and final closed book exam
literatur: Geoffrey A. Jehle and Philip J. Reny, 'Advanced Microeconomic Theory, Third Edition,' Pearson.
